Text: how do u unpack the iso? I burned it onto a disc and when i try to load it from there it trys to burn another  copy of the disc... And where do i find the Microkms activator?

You don't burn it as a data file, copying one large file to a DVD.  Instead, you're supposed to burn it as an .iso.  After it is finished burning, you will see files and directories on the DVD.  There is a setup.exe on the DVD that you would run.
